body.p: The Audio processing manager manages the audio processing HAL devices which can be registered into the system.

body.codeblock: /** * @brief Register an audio processing device * * @param dev Pointer to an Audio Processing device * @return int Return 0 if the register was successful */ int FWK_AudioProcessing_DeviceRegister(audio_processing_dev_t *dev);
Calling this function is unnecessary in most applications and must be used with caution.
